roleset.name: injection of an anesthetic in the lower back

example.name: epidural_injection-n
example.text: He is scheduled for an epidural injection for his neuropathic pain .
example.amr: (s / schedule-01 :ARG1 (h / he) :ARG2 (e / epidural-01 :ARG1 h :ARG2-of (t / therapy-01 :implicit + :ARG1 h :ARG3 (p / pain-01 :ARG0 (d / disease-disorder :name (n / name :op1 "neuropathy")) :ARG1 h))))

example.name: epidural-n, both args
example.text: Her medical team had just administered an epidural to numb her body .
example.amr: (e / epidural-01 :ARG0 (t / team :ARG1-of (m / medical-02) :poss (s / she)) :ARG1 s :ARG2-of (n / numb-01 :ARG0 t :ARG1 (b / body :poss s)) :time (j / just))

roleset.note: NOTES: Added for THYME-AMR. Note that adding a PRP numbered arg would create cycles in AMRs (consider with numb-01, relieve-01, for example).
